import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; // For navigation const Signup = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ fullName: "", email: "", phone: "", password: "", confirmPassword: "", gender: "", location: "", skills: "", }); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Handle form submission (e.g., send data to API) console.log("Form Submitted", formData); navigate("/login"); // Redirect to login page after successful signup }; return (
{/* Container for the form */}
